source:
def matrix_multiply():
  m1 = NEWMAT(2,2)
  m1[0,0] = 1
  m1[0,1] = 2
  m2 = NEWMAT(2,2)
  m2[0,0] = 3
  m2[0,1] = 4
  mresult = m1 * m2
  PRV(mresult)
  assert mresult[0,0] == 3
  assert mresult[0,1] == 4
  assert mresult[1,0] == 0
  assert mresult[1,1] == 0
  return mresult
title: Matrix Multiply
